name: Irish Potatoes
description: Thrive in our cool, damp climate. Plant in March-April.

name: Cabbage
description: Hardy and perfect for Irish weather. Great for colcannon!

name: Rhubarb
description: Grows well in West Cork. Needs minimal maintenance.

name: Hydrangeas
description: Love acidic soil and thrive with our rainfall.

name: Carrots
description: Grow well in deep, stone-free soil. Perfect for Clonakilty's sandy areas.

name: Fuchsia
description: Ireland's unofficial national flower, grows wild in West Cork.
